name: Falcata
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 175MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 175MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.



?Game description
A strategy simulation game set in ancient Persia. In a world steeped in Persian mythology, a fierce battle unfolds to bring prosperity to Asutoran.
Differences in military power are realistically portrayed during battles though a simple system using concise commands and a map with strategic points linked by lines. This title is sure to tax your brain in an effort to strengthen your army's power.

?For playing with PSP®, single player game play or play in turn only. Not compatible with multiple user play.

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
175MB

?Copyright notices
©GUST CO.,LTD.1995


?Attention
This software is converted from the software for PlayStation® so that it can be played on PS3™ and PSP®.
Please note that there may be some functions that cannot be used due to the difference of hardware,
and that the software may not operate in the same manner when it is played with PSP®.
One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View

shot.caption: Choose from 6 parties of 3 different people.
A CGI which turns into our battlefield.
The commands we have at our disposal.
You can try talking your way out of battles with the enemies.
Or just watch them fight each other until one of the warriors is down.
